snippet: One reason for the wave of migrants fleeing to Europe is the deterioration of the conditions that Syrians face in Lebanon, Jordan and Turkey, largely caused by sharp falls in international funding from United Nations countries.
lead_paragraph: One reason for the wave of migrants fleeing to Europe is the deterioration of the conditions that Syrians face in Lebanon, Jordan and Turkey, largely caused by sharp falls in international funding from United Nations countries.

headline.main: The United Nations Syria Regional Refugee and Resilience Plan
